Notes

Repress version on 180 gram vinyl. First issued on 180 gram vinyl in 2004, it has been pressed several times since then. This is the first time the album was pressed by RTI. First pressings of this edition originally included a 2004 dated catalog insert. Black & silver foil cover sticker on outer wrap. Includes printed inner sleeve and MP3 download insert. Tracks are listed sequentially on release.
